chapters.title: Chapter 17: Partings, and a Meeting
chapters.info: Juilin Sandar, p. 245—Thief-taker from Tear, one of the best at his craft. ` He is short, and has taken to wearing a flat-topped, conical hat. He accompanied Nynaeve and Elayne on their travels because Lan asked him to. He accepted partly out of respect for Lan, and partly out of guilt; he betrayed Elayne, Egwene, and Nynaeve to the Black Ajah when Liandrin used Compulsion on him, and later realized how wrong it was. He carries a notched sword-breaker and a staff with which he is deadly; he could make a Whitecloak appear relaxed. He has fallen in love with Amathera, the Panarch of Tarabon. He travels with Mat Cauthon now.
